attributes.action: Quash all petitions in relation to the EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to make it clear that there was a one and only one vote. And the result has been acted upon, it cannot be reversed The minority have to accept what the majority voted for and this has to be made clear
attributes.background: We are sick and tired of people not accepting a demarcating result because it did go the way they wanted it to.  It was democracy at its best, some will be happy some will not.  But what ever the outcome was they have to deal with it.
